extension.dc:title: Types and Specimen
extension.name: TypesAndSpecimen
extension.dc:description: An extension for specimens and types, including type specimens, type species and type genera and simple specimens unrelated to types.

property.name: typeStatus
property.dc:description: The type status of the specimen, not used for type species or type genus

property.name: typeDesignationType
property.dc:description: The reason why this specimen or name is designated as a type.

property.name: typeDesignatedBy
property.dc:description: The citation of the publication where the type designation is found
property.examples: Vachal, J. (1897) Éclaircissements sur de genre Scrapter et description d’une espéce nouvelle de Dufourea. Bulletin de la Société Entomologique de France, 1897, 61–64.

property.name: scientificName
property.dc:description: In case of type specimens the scientific name originally used on the label. Not necessarily the same as the currently recognized name. In case of type species or genera it should be the species or genus name that typifies the higher taxon.

property.name: taxonRank
property.dc:description: The rank of the taxon bearing the scientific name

property.name: bibliographicCitation
property.dc:description: A text string citating the described specimen. Often found in taxonomic treatments and frequently based on institution code and catalog number.
property.examples: Iraq: Mosul: Jabal Khantur prope Sharanish N. Zakho, in fissures rupium calc., 1200 m, Rech. 12083 (W!).

property.name: occurrenceID
property.dc:description: An identifier for the specimen, preferably a resolvable globally unique identifier.

property.name: institutionCode
property.dc:description: The name (or acronym) in use by the institution having custody of the object(s) or information referred to in the record.

property.name: collectionCode
property.dc:description: The name, acronym, coden, or initialism identifying the collection or data set from which the record was derived.

property.name: catalogNumber
property.dc:description: An identifier (preferably unique) for the record within the data set or collection.

property.name: locality
property.dc:description: The location where the the specimen was collected. In case of type specimens the type locality.
property.examples: Iraq: Mosul: Jabal Khantur prope Sharanish N. Zakho, in fissures rupium calc., 1200 m

property.name: sex
property.dc:description: The sex of the specimen being referenced.

property.name: recordedBy
property.dc:description: The primary collector or observer, especially one who applies a personal identifier (recordNumber), should be listed first.

property.name: verbatimLongitude
property.dc:description: The geographic longitude

property.name: verbatimLatitude
property.dc:description: The geographic latitude

property.name: verbatimEventDate
property.dc:description: The date when the specimen was collected

property.name: verbatimLabel
property.dc:description: The full, verbatim text from the specimen label

property.name: created
property.dc:description: The date and time this typeandspecimenwas written or last updated

property.name: creator
property.dc:description: The creator of this typeandspecimenrecord

property.name: license
property.dc:description: Official permission to do something with the resource. Please use Creative Commons URIs if you can.

property.name: modified
property.dc:description: The date and time this typeandspecimenwas written or first created

property.name: rightsHolder
property.dc:description: A person or organization owning or managing rights over the identifier.

property.name: accessRights
property.dc:description: Information about who can access the resource or an indication of its security status.

property.name: rights
property.dc:description: Information about rights held in and over the resource.
